text: is a Japanese footballer who plays for Roasso Kumamoto. ==Career== After playing for the football team of Chukyo University, Sakamoto signed for his hometown team, Roasso Kumamoto, in December 2017.http://roasso-k.com/news/news_view.htm?id=3856 ==Club statistics== Updated to 28 August 2018.Nippon Sports Kikaku Publishing inc./日本スポーツ企画出版社, "J1&J2;&J3;選手名鑑ハンディ版 2018 (NSK MOOK)", 7 February 2018, Japan, (p. 237 out of 289) {| class="wikitable" style="text-align:center" |- ! colspan=3 | Club performance ! colspan=2 | League ! colspan=2 | Cup ! colspan=2 | Total |- !
